hero.title: Gramin: Savor the Authentic Taste of Vegetarian Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Discover a world of wholesome, flavorful dishes crafted with fresh, hand-picked ingredients for a truly memorable dining experience.

about.title: Our Passion for Pure Vegetarian Delights at Gramin
about.paragraph1: At Gramin, we believe in the power of pure, plant-based food to nourish both body and soul. Our culinary journey is a celebration of India's rich vegetarian heritage, bringing traditional flavors and innovative dishes to your table with love and dedication.
about.paragraph2: Every dish served at Gramin is a testament to our commitment to quality, freshness, and authentic taste. We meticulously select the finest seasonal produce to ensure each bite is a delightful experience, inviting you to connect with the essence of wholesome dining.
